title: Adminstration of IIIT Una
selftext: This is how they want to avoid complaint and at a same time they are asking students not to share information reg. Institute to family. WTF
comments: Actually it's mail received to all the students
I am guessing pretty soon they'll add point e to the rules  on not posting college problems on social media.
Glad that I chose IIIT Nagpur over Una :)
This is correct from the administration. I want to see more of these, directed towards the majority, why should only minority face such dictatorship.
I am just angry thats all.
All the best but maybe you are just unaware, I mean these types of situations might be there also
Nagpur mai zyaada hai plus hostel issue...
